0x80A9E7A7.name: TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD

params.name: timeout
params.description: \-1 , other values appear to break the ped movement.

params.name: targetHeading
params.description: The heading you want the ped to be on x,y,z coord.

params.name: distanceToSlide
params.description: The distance from x,y,z where the ped will start sliding.

0x80A9E7A7.description:
TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [TASK_GO_STRAIGHT_TO_COORD](?\_0xD76B57B44F1E6F8B).**
